comments: Completely absurd amount of work expected. Acts like we have nothing else in our life apart from her class. Makes you restate the same information 10 times in 10 different ways. Takes off points for disagreeing with her or having the wrong opinion. She emailed me on a Sunday with 5 new questions and expected me to answer all of them. Awful class.

Expects you to read her mind as requirements and assignments are never, ever clear. Almost always an invisible objective she expects you to intuit. Completely unempathetic. Expects all students to be the same, which is ironic given the course material. Worst teacher I have ever had.
